services.title: Services
services.description: Primelight OU’s team has designed innovative solutions that  combined with proven methodologies, manage compliance risks and address the significant challenges of regulatory compliance  that impact organizations.

company.title: Story of Primelight OU
company.description: Primelight OU challenges the traditional norms of management consulting, providing quality advisory talent that delivers results at a value for money price point. We help our clients from private companies to governments and non-profits to challenge their own industries by becoming more innovative, efficient and dynamic.

team.title: Team
team.description: Our team of 350+ consultants is led by Partners and Managers. These individuals working across 18 countries combine strong educational credentials, intellectual curiosity, proven leadership capacity and commitment to values.

financing.title: Financing
financing.description: Funding programs are an important source of finance during the time of economic uncertainty and additional fuel to finance business activities and societal processes at any time. EU funding programmes are designed to support research, development and innovation and advancement of specific societal priorities (environment and climate actions, audio-visual, cultural and creative sectors, education, training, youth and sports initiatives, etc).

fast-based management consulting and mar: Fast-based management consulting and market research
with an effective management model we en: With an effective management model, we ensure that the money paid for our work is invested in the project, not into overheads
the new office in yerevan: The new office in Yerevan strengthens the company’s regional position
Started as an alliance of advisory firms: Started as an alliance of advisory firms in the Baltic States, and headquartered in Estonia, Primelight OU is now the leading management consultancy from Central Eastern Europe
Primelight OU is the leading management: Primelight OU is the leading management consultancy from Central Eastern Europe. Our consultancy services operate in over 40 countries in Europe, Asia, and USA, resulting in more than 10 000 successful projects. Primelight OU provides exclusive and traditional management consulting services to all clients over the world
We combine bold strategies and transform: We combine bold strategies and transformative technologies to help organizations innovate more sustainably, achieve lasting gains in performance, and build workforces that will thrive for this generation and the next
Primelight OU provides management consul: Primelight OU provides management consulting and data analytic services to companies, star-ups, SMEs, government organizations and etc., delivering professional services and great value for money
Our services include strategy developmen: Our services include strategy development, innovation, funding, research and implementation
We take a consistent approach to recruit: We take a consistent approach to recruiting and skills development regardless of where our people are located, so that we can quickly deliver the right team, with the right experience and expertise, to every client, anywhere in the world
Primelight OU Provides methodological ex: Primelight OU Provides methodological expertise to help its clients capture growth opportunity.
We use innovative technologies to identi: We use innovative technologies to identify new ways to reach consumers and build enterprise resilience.
Safeguard external financing for company: Safeguard external financing for company’s growth.
We gather data and analytics to choose t: We gather data and analytics to choose the right decision for our clients.
Implement the best solutions for our pro: Implement the best solutions for our projects to our clients.
We are using the latest IT technologies: We are using the latest IT technologies to drive the organization’s business.
Primelight OU was founded: Primelight OU was founded in Estonia back in 2010 and has been in continuous operation for more than 11 years.
with a sales offices in the: with a sales offices in the
Most of our projects come from an intern: Most of our projects come from an international mindset and have ensured successful cooperation with clients in Europe, Asia and Africa. Primelight OU is known by many as the world’s leading consulting firm in the knowledge management field.
We are always looking for young talents: We are always looking for young talents from our local markets who want to develop professionally by doing meaningful projects in their home countries and internationally. If you are a student or a recent graduate, we offer various internship and entry-level positions that will best suit your needs.
We truly believe that anyone can become: We truly believe that anyone can become a management consultant and apply relevant knowledge to drive change in organizations and make an impact on society.
Our people are based at many different l: Our people are based at many different locations so we can often assure you local support with necessary knowledge of local and global markets.
Our employees excel in both conceptual p: Our employees excel in both conceptual planning and implementation and offer you:
Focus on employee growth and development: Focus on employee growth and development
The companys corporate headquarters are: The company’s corporate headquarters are located in Tallinn, Estonia.
We assist companies in various industrie: We assist companies in various industries such as telecommunications, banking, insurance, retail, wholesale, manufacturing, FMCG, transport, energy, HORECa, media and publishing, IT services, construction, forestry, agriculture, real estate and etc.
We support start -ups and small companie: We support start -ups and small companies involved in different industries and focusing on innovative companies and start-up ecosystem development.
We provide services for government: We provide services for government, educational institutions, hospitals, state-owned companies, public infrastructure and energy utility establishments.
Our consultants advise organizations on: Our consultants advise organizations on high-level decisions in strategic planning, expansion of new markets, management modification using deep industry knowledge to deliver the best results. We offer the best strategy practices and experience gained across many countries and industries.
We help making future by being in the wh: We help making future by being in the whole innovation value chain from helping clients innovate to evaluating, finding and creating sustainable innovations through our multiyear experience and professional team.
We help clients to choose the right fund: We help clients to choose the right funding opportunities, develop the project and follow through the implementation process. We also provide advisory services in national EU program funding, EU-level program funding (Horizon 2020).
We collect and analyze external and inte: We collect and analyze external and internal information in order to deliver the best solutions to our clients. Primelight OU conducts research into trends and developments in the consulting industry, aswell as performs research into trending topics at the intersection of management, economics, IT, real estate, construction and many other fields.
We help our clients to become more compe: We help our clients to become more competitive in the digital market by using Big Data and the latest IT innovations. We provide digital strategies, customer analysis and redesign, UX/UI, web and mobile software development, segmentation and other IT services.
We provide support and assistance at all: We provide support and assistance at all stages of the project implementation, by setting up and running project management office, helping with business development and expansion, as well as building outsourcing network in Central Eastern Europe.
We ensure our clients stability in all d: We ensure our clients stability in all daily operations in a strategic and qualitative manner, as well assist them in obtaining optimal funding opportunities. Our emphasis on sustainability, trust and tolerance for diverging opinions helps clients focus on their opportunities, build their capabilities and win the future.
Poland-based SAS Advisors is joining Pri: Poland-based SAS Advisors is joining Primelight OU
We use methodologies and approaches of t: We use methodologies and approaches of the traditional consulting toolkit, with a focus on analytical rigor and fact-based problem-solving. Our prior consulting experience in over 10 000 projects and extensive network allows us to make use of the best industry and functional practices.
We started our journey in Estonia: We started our journey in Estonia — home of the world’s most digitally advanced society (e-Estonia) and a world-class start-up ecosystem. We noticed that in small countries it’s not easy to access competitive and high-quality management consulting services: local companies are too small to offer everything clients need, while international companies are not easy to access, either lacking a local presence or asking for higher prices to cover their high overhead costs. As our company grew, we understood that our approach is fit not only for small countries but for bigger countries as well.
Taking advantage of our unique origin an: Taking advantage of our unique origin and experience, we took a Challenger approach in the management consulting sector to bridge that gap. We decided to mix smart people with lean processes and structures, thus creating the leading company in Central and Eastern Europe.
Until today we have exported our busines: Until today, we have exported our business model to Emerging Europe as well as to the Nordics, and now we are present in 17 European countries. We have been developing our company based on the “one company” principle — so that even our smaller local offices are able to serve big projects in multiple areas.
We challenge our competitors: We challenge our competitors — we deliver more value, at scale.
We challenge our clients: We challenge our clients — we are not afraid to ask the tough questions and help clients to challenge themselves or their own industries.
We challenge ourselves: We challenge ourselves — we like unconventional projects
Primelight OU was established as an alli: Primelight OU was established as an alliance of consulting companies in the Baltic States (Primelight OU, Innopolis, and Advisio). From its roots in the Baltics, Primelight OU has expanded in a puzzle-like fashion through organic growth, mergers, and acquisitions. Today, our company employs over 300 consultants in 18 countries, with about half of the employees working outside the Baltics.

We value people who are not ordinary and: We value people who are not ordinary and who do not want to do everyday things. We are open to new experiences and challenging the status quo. It's never boring around here!
We are about learning on the job through: We are about learning on the job through a variety of intellectually challenging projects spanning various industries, functions, and geographies.
We value a high degree of responsibility: We value a high degree of responsibility and the importance of input from every employee from day one on the job. Everyone is expected to contribute to overall success.
We seek to balance getting the job done: We seek to balance getting the job done with employees’ lives outside work, creating the possibilities to combine studies, entrepreneurial activities, hobbies, sports, and family life.
At Primelight OU we provide an enjoyable: At Primelight OU, we provide an enjoyable working atmosphere, social events, offsite sessions and trips abroad for the whole company.
Consulting career path at Primelight OU: Consulting career path at Primelight OU
We truly believe that our success lies i: We truly believe that our success lies in the talented and passionate team of professionals who make Primelight OU a great place to work. We encourage our personnel to seek adventure in everything they do and help them to achieve their professional and personal goals.
Apply now and build your career in Prime: Apply now and build your career in Primelight OU, gain international experience and make an impact. Fill in the application form. Our team will review it and contact you. For any questions regarding your application, send an email to
Leads several teams with growing role in: Leads several teams with growing role in mentorship of other colleagues and business development
Full-responsibility over project executi: Full-responsibility over project execution ensuring that it is delivered on time within high quality and budget expectations
Intellectual leader with deep expertise: Intellectual leader with deep expertise in some particular industry and/or service line and own client portfolio
Works more closely with client team memb: Works more closely with client team members and owns a particular stream in the project, such as performing operational analysis, market research, financial model, etc.
Performs larger and more sophisticated t: Performs larger and more sophisticated tasks, including data analysis and visualization, formulating and testing hypotheses, etc.
Supports the team with market research: Supports the team with market research, analysis, data collection, generation of ideas and other daily tasks

How can we help you grow: How can we help you grow?
Local programs in Estonia for applied re: Local programs in Estonia for applied research in smart specialization growth areas, product development, digital diagnostics, enterprise development, innovation voucher, development voucher, and large investor support.
Local programs in Latvia for new product: Local programs in Latvia for new products and technologies development in competence centers and innovation vouchers.
Local programs in Lithuania for industry: Local programs in Lithuania for industry digitization, eco-innovations, green industry innovation, and ICT.
Local programs in Romania for innovative: Local programs in Romania for innovative green, blue and ICT technologies, products, processes, and solutions.
Horizon Europe supports large internatio: Horizon Europe supports large international consortiums composing of R&D, industry, policy and societal stakeholders in producing world-class science and technology, improving industrial leadership and solving societal challenges of Europe by funding research, development and innovation.
EIC supports highly innovative SMEs and: EIC supports highly innovative SMEs and start-ups in developing ground-breaking business ideas further into market-ready products, service or processes by financing advanced prototyping, validation, trials, demonstration, testing, certification and commercialization.
Cascade funding opportunities are calls: Cascade funding opportunities are calls organized within H2020 projects to tech start-ups or scale-ups via acceleration, incubation and mentoring programs or for implementing pilots, demonstrations and experiments on a specific innovative technology or framework defined in the project.
The European Institute of Innovation and: The European Institute of Innovation and Technology supports the creation and fining of innovative solutions to major societal challenges through training and education programs, development of innovative products and services and powering startups and scale-ups.
Erasmus supports education: Erasmus+ supports education, training, youth and sport organisations by financing collaboration in the fields of academic and vocational training, schools, adult learning, European sport events, teaching, research, networking and policy debate on EU topics.
Creative Europe supports the audiovisual: Creative Europe supports the audiovisual, cultural and creative players by financing their operations across Europe in order to reach new audiences and to develop the skills needed in the digital age.
LIFE supports private bodies public enti: LIFE+ supports private bodies, public entities and NGOs in the environment and climate field by financing technology development, strategies and policy development aimed at ensuring nature conservation, biodiversity, environment and resource efficiency, climate change mitigation and adaptation.
Innovation Fund supports innovation in t: Innovation Fund supports innovation in the fields of energy-intensive industries; renewables; energy storage; carbon capture, use and storage. The aim of the fund is to support investments in the next generation of technologies needed for EU‘s low-carbon transition as well as boost the growth and competitiveness of EU companies.
